name: The Heart's Game
description:
The Hearts Game is a physics based 3D puzzle-platformer  about the Heart's journey through grief. Collect Pictures, obtain special abilities, and solve puzzles as you journey through a metaphorical world with a cast of odd characters.

Unique features include:

  • A respect for Newton's 3 laws ~90% of the time
  • 4 unlockable abilities
  • A heart-rate system that increases the Heart's speed and jump at higher heart rates
  • A draining health bar that is linked to the heart rate as well
  •  Meta-4s!
  • Some of my brother's amazing concept art

The game is currently in development, and I'm appreciative of any and all feedback (or questions) as I continue.

I'm very excited to share anything new as development trudges on. This project is a direct evolution of one of my previous projects. You can check it out here: https://green-panda-studios.itch.io/painless. The atmospheric direction is similar, so if you like the feel, you'll probably enjoy this.

Drop a comment below or check out the Devlog. This helps me know people are seeing what's out there so far. I'm looking forward to both good and bad feedback from the community. 

Can't wait to share more!
